View on GitHub

Octave.app

A native Mac app distribution of GNU Octave

Contact

The Octave.app project is hosted on GitHub under the octave-app organization.

Please remember that we are just a packager of GNU Octave, and do not develop Octave ourselves. Problems with the native Mac app or installer/DMG should be reported to us. Problems with GNU Octave itself should be reported upstream to GNU Octave.

Problems with Octave.app? Report a bug on octave-app.

Problems with octave-app-bundler, the Octave.app bundling too? Report a bug on octave-app-bundler.

People

Sebastian Schoeps is the original author and maintainer.

Andrew Janke is a maintainer.
